overview: Disassembling & reconstructing, a body, a state of mind. This film is a dialog between the body & the mind in a dream/nightmare like environment. On a larger scale this film started from an ongoing dialog the filmmaker has about what it means to inhabit a body, made of parts, that are assigned gender within a societal structure. Allowing the individual mind/body to have more control on defining & constructing itself.
title: Game/boy
